pages.text: Once there was a very hungry crocodile.
He searched for food slowly and quietly.
After that he is no longer hungry,  and he is happy.

You are free to download, copy, translate or adapt this story and use the illustrations as long as you attribute in the following way:
The hungry crocodile

gameDatas.question: Crocodile searched for food slowly and quietly.
What do you feel when you get your favourite thing to eat?
